name: Bodyguard
description: The Bodyguard can choose one player to protect every night. That player cannot be killed that night and instead the Bodyguard will be attacked. They survive the first attack due to their strength, but will die or get inflicted by a status on the second attack. They automatically protect themselves every night before the first attack.

abilities.name: Bodyguard Shield
abilities.description: Protects one player to redirect attacks from and into oneself.

name: Jailer
description: The Jailer can select a player during the day to put in jail the following night. They can talk to the jailed player at night anonymously. Jailed players cannot use any of their abilities or be attacked. They have one bullet to kill a jailed player during the night.

name: Aura Seer
description: The Aura Seer can select a player to uncover their alignment each night. Those alignments could be: Good, Evil, or Unknown. Evil players belong to the Werewolves Team and good players belong to the Village team.

name: Medium
description: The Medium can talk anonymously with the dead during the night. They can select a dead villager at night to revive at the start of the next day once per game.

name: Regular Werewolf
description: The Werewolf can vote on a player to kill and talk with the other Werewolves each night.

name: Fool
description: The Fool has no special abilities besides talking and voting during the day.

name: Loudmouth
description: The Loudmouth can select a player. That player's role will be revealed to everyone when the Loudmouth dies.

name: Villager
description: The Villager is a member of the Village team without any special abilities.

name: Witch
description: The Witch has two potions. One will kill and the other will protect a player. The protect potion is only consumed if the player is attacked. The poison cannot be used in the first night.

name: Detective
description: The Detective can select two players to uncover if they are in the same team each night. Those possible teams are: Village, Werewolves, Fool, Headhunter, Serial killer, and Other Solo Killers/Converters

name: Junior Werewolf
description: Each night the Junior Werewolf can vote on a player to kill like a regular Werewolf. They can also select one player to die with them. They can select this player during any phase of the game. The Junior's selected player will not die if they flee.

name: Arsonist
description: The Arsonist can choose from two actions to perform each night. They can either douse 2 players in gasoline, or ignite all doused players, killing them. The Arsonist cannot be killed by the Werewolves.

name: Red Lady
description: The Red Lady can visit another player at night. If they are attacked while visiting, they will not be killed. However, if they visit a player that is attacked, or a werewolf or a solo killer, they will die.

name: Priest
description: The Priest can throw holy water on another player once during the day. If that player is a werewolf, they die. If they are not a werewolf, the Priest dies.

name: Nightmare Werewolf
description: Twice during the day in a game, the Nightmare Werewolf can decide to put a player to sleep for the next night. This means that the sleeping player cannot use their role abilities the night after they were put to sleep.
